endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: Your ImageKit.io URL endpoint. Find it in your dashboard at https://imagekit.io/dashboard/developer/api-keys

versions.title: Include Versions
versions.description: Include old versions in directory listings

upload_tags.title: Upload Tags
upload_tags.description: Tags to add to uploaded files (e.g. 'tag1,tag2')
